title: Clash of the Tour de France TT Titans: Will Evenepoel Topple Pogačar Against the Clock?
content:
‘There will be five seconds between Evenepoel and Pogačar’: contenders and their teams talk confidence, homework and tech marginal gains ahead of 25km time trial.

Read the full article at Clash of the Tour de France TT Titans: Will Evenepoel Topple Pogačar Against the Clock? on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
